main.bio: My name is Hector, and I'm a Computer Engineer and Full Stack Developer. I'm passionate about technology and driven by a need to solve even the most demanding puzzles. I enjoy working with TypeScript, React JS, Express, Python, and SQL-databases, and I'm always excited to learn new technologies.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details or have a fun conversation.

testimonials.text: Recursively splitting a problem into two or more sub-problems (divide), until these become simple enough to be solved directly (conquer).
'First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.'

'First, think and write the solution out on paper in steps. Then start writing the code. Donâ€™t get complicated in the code and software design first because it will only serve to have to do things several times and waste time.
